scenes.label: *start
texts: Though surrounded in every direction by shining buildings, not even the Shinjuku Crater was immune to the dark of night.
With the reconstruction focused on the outer edges, the deeper parts of the crater were saturated with silence and darkness.
Oz‚ÄîTengen Ozutani‚Äîwas standing on a construction platform sticking out from the ground, and looking down into the dark.
There, he saw his beloved car, now little more than a pile of scrap.
Oz, you're way too down down like a sad old clown. If it's broken, you just gotta fix it.
The girl beside him‚ÄîNonoka Hosho‚Äîtried to console Oz, but her words only upset him further.
Do you have any idea how much it'd cost to restore her in this day and age?
It's your own fault for driving old cars.
They heard footsteps nearby, and were soon joined by a man.
Kaoru! Oz's car is all beat-up! Buy him a new one!
...I see. Looks like you've been through the wringer.
Kaoru Samezu‚Äîchief of TMPD Cyber Security Division's Cyber Countermeasures Office‚Äîstood next to Oz and Nonno, looking down.
Like I told ya, I got rammed by a bunch of unmanned cars.
It was probably a <tips,19,CANBUS hack>. And the perpetrator must've been quite skilled to have controlled so many cars at once.
Behind him were the battered vehicles of the construction workers.
Was the <tips,20,Special Forces Group> behind this too?
No, this ain't how Narashino does things.
I imagine it was the woman you almost ran over. I'll have to take the drive recorder.
Oz shrugged and changed the subject.
So, what did you learn about the pair they were chasin'?
Kaoru turned on a TMPD-issued tablet, displaying a certain person's profile.
The boy is in TMPD's database.
No. About half a year ago, he got enrolled in one of our delinquent mentorships after participating in illegal graper races.
Kaoru shared the info with Oz's device.
Was she the one they were after?
Might've been the both of them. Are they down there?
We'll take them into custody immediately.
You gonna search for them yourself?
A police car pulled up with perfect timing, its sirens muted.
They're officers of TMPD Cyber Security Division's CCO. And idols too.
Who are we supposed to look for?
Kaoru shared with them the same info he'd shared with Oz.
The boy is Pollon Takaoka, 16 years old. The girl is currently unidentified.
Takaoka is a suspect in several counts of traffic light and power supply system cracking incidents, as well as speeding.
The two are currently somewhere in the Shinjuku Crater.
How do we get an arrest warrant?
You aren't to arrest them, simply take them into custody. Refrain from using violent measures.
Umm... I don't like the dark...
Stop being a scaredy-cat and let's go.
Kurashina, I feel as if I'm forever saying this, but...
Always remember to wear your cute smile.

scenes.label: *keirei
texts: After her exchange with Kaoru, Bambi corrected her posture and gave a salute.

scenes.label: *storehis
texts: ...The hell was that about cute smiles?
The mission of all idols is a simple one. To share their smiles with fans, and in turn, make those fans smile too.
Hey, those police cars on their shoulders are kinda cool!

scenes.label: *last
texts: They are, aren't they? I'll bring you some merchandise next time.
Oh, Kaoru! You always know just what to say!
It's been almost two years since Sad Morning, huh?
I sometimes feel as though the world has already forgotten all about it. Life is going on as if it never happened.
Maybe it's because the sites are fenced off and out of sight.
But it's not like the stink's gone. Everyone's just puttin' a tarp over the mess and pretending it's clean.
Ya gotta get a little numb to it if you wanna stay sane.
So, in a way, this behavior is very human?
Exactly. Behavior like this proves we have souls at all, man.
